FROM 40ESE SNY-50NE ELD-30WNW LSU-60N PSX-CWK-ABI-40E TBE-60ESE 
DBL-40ESE SNY 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
